bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Requirements for Time Tags Created by Intelligent Electronic Devices--COMTAG
IEEE Standard for Requirements for Time Tags Created by Intelligent Electronic Devices--COMTAG

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Common requirements for associating time tags with data items recorded or transmitted by Intelligent Electronic Devices (IEDs) are established in this standard. Time tag attributes and requirements for describing time tag accuracy are specified in this standard.

Common requirements for associating time tags with data items recorded or transmitted by Intelligent Electronic Devices (IEDs) are established in this standard. Time tag attributes and requirements for describing time tag accuracy are specified in this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
